A Dark Day for Cormyr was a book penned by Bardraskur, Bard of Immersea in the mid-13 century DR.
The work was published in the . Its flowery musings and warnings eerily foreshadowed the events that took place a century later, when the mythical Lost Spell was unearthed in Cormyr in the , unleashing a magical spellstorm.
